CLUE: The animal said to be stubborn
FOUND IN: Mule: Known for their notoriously stubborn nature, mules are a popular example in folklore when describing stubbornness.
Precision shooting ranges: Focusing on long-range targets at established indoor firing ranges helps improve marksmanship and aim accuracy over extended distances.
Kalahari: Located in Botswana, Namibia, and South Africa, this expansive sandy savanna covers parts of southern Africa.
Karaoke singing: Performers use a microphone with prerecorded backing tracks while trying to imitate famous singers during live performances or practice sessions.
